sense.gloss: clipping (of newspaper article, etc.), cutting, scrap (for a scrapbook)

sdata.j: ↑堅苦↑↓かたくる↓しい↑礼儀↑↓れいぎ↓は↑一↑↓いち↓↑切抜↑↓|きりぬ↓き|にしましょう。
sdata.e: Let's do away with all formalities.

sdata.j: ↑箱↑↓はこ↓の↑中↑↓なか↓には↑新聞↑↓しんぶん↓や↑雑誌↑↓ざっし↓の↑切↑↓|き↓り↑抜↑↓ぬ↓き|があった。
sdata.e: Inside the box were cuttings from newspapers and magazines.
